messages.message:
hey team, not sure if this is the right place to ask this, but figured I might get redirected from here to the right place

JPMC are using metrics to understand how many pages have been processed through Instabase this year. In production we are seeing an issue where on certain days the number of runs (which iâ€™m assuming equals jobs) show higher in metrics than flows that were run in the flow dashboard

Date: 20th December
Runs in Metrics - 97
Flows in Dashboard - 69 (counted manually after all pages refreshed)

Am I correct in thinking that the flowdashboard will show every flow, without fail? If so, is there any method I can provide to JPMC to understand the number of pages processed in those flows?
